Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MainControllerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class MainController extends Object implements MainControllerInterface, Serializable
MainController is a singleton that manages the creation and joining of games.
See Also:

    • addPlayerToGame

      private GameControllerInterface addPlayerToGame(String playerNickname, GameListener listener, List<GameController> GCs) throws RemoteException
      Adds a player to the first element of the passed GameController list. If no game is available, a new game is created.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - The nickname of the player.
      listener - The player's listener for game events.
      GCs - The list of GameControllers.
      Returns:
      The GameControllerInterface for the game joined or created.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a remote communication error.
